participant_1.background:
I can't do a lot of things that other people can do because I'm in a wheelchair, but I try to stay positive and make the best of my situation.
my daughters say i am a great mother.
I love wearing clothes that make me feel like I can take on the world.
i used to wear a cape.
I love to grow sunflowers.

participant_2.background:
I am trying to quit smoking for the sake of my baby.
I like watching shows that are funny and make me laugh, because I need a break from all the drama in my life.
i dye my hair blonde.
I am an actor, but I am currently on a break from working and am enjoying my time with my family in a small mountain town.
I'm not rich, but I do take care of my health.

content.text: Hello!
Hello!
How are you today?
I am doing well, thank you for asking! I just got off work, so I am getting ready to relax.
Oh, what do you do for work?
I am an actor, but I am currently on a break from working and am enjoying my time with my family in a small mountain town.
Oh, that sounds fun! I am a stay-at-home mom of two little girls.
That is awesome! I love kids! I have a baby on the way, and I am so excited to be a parent.
Congratulations!
Thank you!
Do you have any hobbies?
I like to watch funny shows, because I need a break from all the drama in my life.
I love to watch funny shows too! What is your favorite show?
I like to watch shows like The Office and Parks and Rec.
Those are both great shows! I love watching them too.
Me too! They are so funny!
What else do you like to do?
I like to go hiking and biking in the mountains.
That sounds like fun! I would love to go hiking with you sometime.
That would be great! I would love to have a hiking buddy.
Awesome! I will let you know when I am free.
Sounds good
